The Anhui Wugou Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Miao Qian in Suixi County, Huaibei City, Anhui Province

operators: Anhui Hengyuan Coal Power Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Anhui Hengyuan Coal Power Co Ltd is the operator of the mine.
